title: Passpartout: The Starving Artist 1.7.2 – Experience the life of a starving artist!
content: Passpartout puts you into the shoes of a French artist trying to navigate the beautifully confusing art scene. Paint and sell your own art to survive your expensive wine and baguette addiction.   Features Paint your own masterpieces! Even you can become the next Van Gogh! title: ChuChu Rocket Universe 1.2.1 – A Mind Blowing 3D Puzzle Game
content: ChuChu Rocket! is back. Enjoy the revived SEGA hit game as it scurries its way into a series of mind-blowing 3D puzzles. title: The Collage Atlas 1.0.3 – A Unique Pen & Ink Adventure
content: The Collage Atlas invites you on a journey through an entirely hand-drawn picture-book dream-world.   From the grass beneath your feet, to the butterflies dancing in the air, to the floating islands drifting overhead – every little detail has been lovingly-crafted with pen & ink on paper.   The result is a world the likes […]

title: Fledgling Heroes 1.1.0563 – Takeoff and take on the world

title: Super Impossible Road 1.3.2 – Winning is Cheating
content: In the future, you’ve got to play a little dirty if you want to win races. Master hairpin turns across dangerous courses that twist and coil over beautiful galactic backdrops. title: Kiwi for Gmail 2.0.40 – Turns Gmail into a full-powered Desktop client
content: Kiwi for Gmail (formerly Gmail for Mac) turns Gmail into a full-powered desktop email client. title: Base64 Coder 2.1.0 – Convert files to a Base64 format
content: Base64 Coder is a fast and easy converter files to a Base64 format.   Features: Fast work; Automatically string copy; Drag & Drop; MIME prefix support; Save result to file; Result formatting   Version 2.1.0: Apple Silicon support   Intel, 64-bit processor OS X 10.10 or later
